text.test.delete.title: Deleting test
text.help.lectures: To view test results, select the desired group and test type. You can also see the results of tests by subgroups and each individual student
text.help.tests: On this page, you can observe the process of passing tests to control knowledge. Correctly answered questions are displayed in green, and incorrectly answered in red.
text.help.themes: To prepare a test, you need to create it, fill it with questions and answers. It is also necessary to indicate the time for passing the test and the number of questions in it. To preview the test and open access to it, click on the corresponding icons.
text.help.questions: On this page, you can add a new question to the test. To do this, fill in all the fields of the question and select the type of answer. You can also add a question from an existing test.
text.help.viewRealTime: On this page, you can observe the process of passing tests to control knowledge. Correctly answered questions are displayed in green, and incorrectly answered in red.
text.test.for.control.hint: It is necessary to open access to students for each test
text.test.for.self.control.hint: You need to open access to students once, when the test is ready
